title: kalakaminri ulagamellAm
sahitya:
kalakaminri ulagamellAm kalandu vAzhalAm manidA


anupallavi

  pala pala mata bhEdaminri paraman aruLir-karaNam onri


caraNam    aNDamellAm Atma nAthan ADum Alayam Aruyirt-toghudi Ishan Ananda 
vaDivAm koNDu koDuttuk-kulamonrAkkik-kUDik-kuDittArk-kUzhum amudAm
